message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is simply too high. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll see the value it brings.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I still believe that $10,000 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.
